import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent { onomatopoeiaList: string[] = []; onReceiveNewOnomatopia(event: string): void { this.onomatopoeiaList.push(event); } }
